S01suvrnavu:2_1_0: [1] evam anuśrūyate sthavira mahākāśyape parinirvṛte sthavirānando mahātmā śāradvatīputrasamanuprajñayā
S01suvrnavu:2_1_1: samanvāgatas tathāgata iva kāruṇyāt teṣu teṣu grāmanagaranigamapallīpattanādiṣu tāṃs
S01suvrnavu:2_1_2: tān vaineyāṃs tais tair upāyaviśeṣair vinayati sma /
S01suvrnavu:2_2: yāvad apareṇa samayena vineyavaśād anekāni sattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahastrāṇi saddharmmadeśanāmṛtavarṣābhiṣekeṇa santarpayan vaiśālyām viharaty āmrapālīvane /
S01suvrnavu:3_1_0: [2] tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājagṛhe nagare divākaro nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasaty
S01suvrnavu:3_1_1: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratisparddhī /
S01suvrnavu:3_3: sa tayā sārddha krīḍati ramate paricārayati sma /
S01suvrnavu:3_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
S01suvrnavu:3_6: deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣv anyatamasya puṇyamaheśākhyasya devaputrasya pañcapūrvanimittāni prādurbhūtāni /
S01suvrnavu:3_7: sa buddhotpādavibhūṣitaṃ lokam avalokya nirvāṇābhilāṣīcchati manuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ grahītum /
S01suvrnavu:4_1_0: [3] adrākṣīc chakro devendras taṃ devaputraṃ cyavanadharmmāṇaṃ buddhotpādavibhūṣitaṃ
S01suvrnavu:4_1_1: lokam avalokya nirvāṇābhilāṣī icchati manuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ grahītum iti dṛṣṭvā
S01suvrnavu:4_2: sa cet tvaṃ mārṣa icchasi manuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ grahītum /
S01suvrnavu:4_3: rājagṛhe nagare divākarasya sārthavāhasya patnyāḥ kukṣau pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhāṇeti /
S01suvrnavu:4_4: sa kathayati kauśikaṃ aśrāddho 'sau sārthavāhas tasya buddhe prasādo nāstīti /
S01suvrnavu:4_5: śakraḥ kathayati / mārṣa gṛhāṇa tvaṃ ahan tathā kariṣyāmi yathāsau sārthavāho buddhaśāsane 'bhiprasīdatīti /
S01suvrnavu:4_6: devaputraḥ kathayati / kauśika sa ced asau sārthavāhaḥ sapatnīko yāvajjīvaṃ ratnatrayaṃ śaraṇaṅ gacched evam ahaṃ tasya sārthavāhasya patnyāḥ kukṣau pratisandhiṃ grahīṣyāmīti /
S01suvrnavu:5_1: [4] tataḥ śakro devendro devebhyas trayastriṃśebhya antarīkṣe rājagṛhe nagare divākarasya sārthavāhasya gṛhe uparime talake pratyasthāt /
S01suvrnavu:5_2_0: śakrasya devendrasya varṇānubhāvena sarvatra gṛhaṃ divyenāvabhāsenāvabhāsitam adrākṣīd
S01suvrnavu:5_2_1: divākaraḥ sārthavāhas tu divyam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar vismayotphullalocanaś caturdiśam
S01suvrnavu:5_2_2: avalokayitum ārabdhaḥ yāvat paśyati śakraṃ devendraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ sahasaiva tasya
S01suvrnavu:5_2_3: padayor praṇipatyovāca devendra lābhā me sulabdhā me tvaṃ gṛham āyātaḥ pavitrīkṛtañ
S01suvrnavu:5_4: śakro devendraḥ kathayati / sārthavāha tvam aputraḥ putrābhinandī tad adyāgreṇa sapatnīko yāvajjīvaṃ ratnatrayaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha /
S01suvrnavu:5_5: putras te bhaviṣyatīti // divākaraḥ sārthavāho hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagramanāḥ kathayati /
S01suvrnavu:5_6_0: devendra yathā tvam ājñāpayasi tathā karomy eṣo 'ham adyāgreṇa sapatnīko jāvajjīvaṃ
S01suvrnavu:5_6_1: ratnatrayaṃ śaraṇaṅ gacchāmīty atha śakro devendro divākaraṃ sārthavāhaṃ sapatnīkaṃ
S01suvrnavu:5_6_2: śaraṇagamane pratiṣṭhāpya rājagṛhād antarhito deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣv pratyaṣṭāt /
S01suvrnavu:5_7: tasya devaputrasya bhavane tataḥ śakro devendras tasya devaputrasyaitat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇākhyātavān /
S01suvrnavu:6_1: [5] yāvad asau devaputro devebhyas trayastriṃśebhyaś cyuto rājagṛhe nagare divākarasya sārthavāhasya patnyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:6_2: sa yata eva tasyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntas tata eva tasyāḥ sārthavāhapatnyāḥ śarīre parā varṇapuṣkalatā prādurbhūtā /
S01suvrnavu:6_5: katame pañca / raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti / viraktaṃ jānāti / kālaṃ jānāti / ṛtuṃ jānāti / garbham avakrāntaṃ jānāti / yasya sakāśād garbho 'vakrāmati taṃ jānāti /
S01suvrnavu:6_6: dārakaṃ jānāti / dārikāṃ jānāti / sa ced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśṛtya tiṣṭhati /
S01suvrnavu:6_7: sa ced dārikā bhavati / vāmaṃ kukṣin niḥsṛtya tiṣṭhati /
S01suvrnavu:6_9: diṣṭyāryaputra varddhase / āpannasattvāsmi saṃvṛttā / yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:6_10: śrutvā ca punaḥ so 'py āttamanātamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇam bāhum abhiprasāryodānam udānayati /
S01suvrnavu:6_11: apy evāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyaṃ jāto me syān nāvajātaḥ kṛtyāni me kurvvīta bhṛtaḥ pratibibhṛyād dāyādyaṃ pratipadyet /
S01suvrnavu:6_12: kulavaṃśo me cirasthitikaḥ syād asmākañ cātyatītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtam vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākañ ca nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate /
S01suvrnavu:6_13: idaṃ tayor yatra tatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti
S01suvrnavu:7_1: [6] āpannasattvāñ caināṃ viditvā upariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati /
S01suvrnavu:7_2_0: śīte śītopakaraṇai uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
S01suvrnavu:7_2_2: āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrtrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ
S01suvrnavu:7_3: na cāsyāḥ kiñcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
S01suvrnavu:7_4: sā aṣṭānām vā navānām vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
S01suvrnavu:7_6: uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ sarvajanamanonayanaharaḥ suvarṇapītair vastrair avaguṇṭhitavigrahaḥ sarvaśarīrāc cāsya candanagandho vāti /
S01suvrnavu:7_8: tasya jātamātrasya tasmin gṛhe vastravarṣaṃ karṇikārakusumavarṣañ ca patitam /
S01suvrnavu:8_1: [7] tatas tām atyadbhutāṃ tasya ca rūpaudāryasampadāṃ dṛṣṭvā divākarasya sārthavāhasya patnī parijanaś ca param vismayam āpannaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:8_2: divākaraś ca sārthavāho gṛhasya bahir dvārakoṣṭhake sthitaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:8_3: tasya niveditaṃ sārthavāho diṣṭyā varddhase putras tu jāta iti /
S01suvrnavu:8_4: sa hṛṣṭatuṣṭodagramanā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo yāvat paśyati kumāram atyantam abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:8_6: uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataṃ sarvajanamanonayanaharaṃ suvarṇapītair vastrair avaguṇṭhitavigrahaṃ kāyāc cāsya candanagandho vāti mukhāc ca nīlotpalagandhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:8_8_0: tāni ca vastrāṇi suvarṇavarṇāni dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paramaprītiprāmodya udānam udānayati
S01suvrnavu:8_8_1: aho lābhā me sulabdhāḥ aho paripūṇo me manoratho yasya me īdṛśaḥ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ
S01suvrnavu:9_1: [8] tasya ca kumārasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśati divasān vistareṇa jātamātrasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
S01suvrnavu:9_3: jñātaya ucur ayaṃ kumāra uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ /
S01suvrnavu:9_4: tasmād bhavatu kumārasya suvarṇavarṇa iti nāma suvarṇavarṇa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradattaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:9_5_0: dvābhyām aṅkadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ
S01suvrnavu:9_5_1: krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ yāvad āśu varddhate hradastham iva paṅkajam sa yadā mahān
S01suvrnavu:9_5_2: saṃvṛttaḥ tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ uddhāre nyāse nikṣepe
S01suvrnavu:9_5_3: vastuparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ ibhiparīkṣāyāṃ aśvaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ
S01suvrnavu:9_5_4: ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghāṭako vācakaḥ
S01suvrnavu:9_6: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitaṃ pratipannaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:9_7: kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmmakāmaḥ satvatsalas tena ca śāstrāṇy adhītāni /
S01suvrnavu:9_9: yat prārthayati / vastrādikan dhanaṃ sarvan tat tathaiva sampadyate /
S01suvrnavu:9_10: kin tu na vijānāty aham eva puṇyamaheśākhya iti /
S01suvrnavu:9_11: divākaraś ca sārthavāho ratnatrayaśaraṇagamanaprabhāvān me putro jāta iti bhūyasyā mātrayā bhagavac chāsane 'bhiprasannaḥ sa kālena kālaṃ bhagavacchāsane kārāṅ karoti sma /
S01suvrnavu:10_1_0: [9] tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare vimalo nāma sārthavāho mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātro
S01suvrnavu:10_1_1: 'bhyāgatas tenārddhatrayodaśaparivāraṃ buddham bhagavantaṃ bhojayitvā ekaiko bhikṣus
S01suvrnavu:10_1_2: tricīvareṇācchāditas tasya yaśasā sarvo loka āpūrṇaḥ sārthasya saphalaṃ mahāsamudrāvataraṇaṃ
S01suvrnavu:10_1_3: sārthavāhaśabdaś ca yenaivaṃ bhagavacchāsane kārāḥ kṛtā iti /
S01suvrnavu:10_5_0: yāvantaḥ ke cana bhagavacchrāvakā jambūdvīpe prativasanti bhagavantaṃ vijñapya tān
S01suvrnavu:10_5_1: aikadhya sannipātya praṇītenāhāreṇa santarpya ekaikaṃ bhikṣuṃ mahārheṇa tricīvareṇācchādayiṣyāmīti /
S01suvrnavu:10_7: sā kathayati svāmin ṛdhyantu tava saṅkalpāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:10_9_0: tato divākaraḥ sārthavāho rājagṛhe nagare yāvat trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṅ kārayitvā
S01suvrnavu:10_9_1: pañcavaṇikaśataparivāro mahāsamudram avatīrṇas tasya tasmin mahāsamudre 'vatīrṇasya
S01suvrnavu:10_9_2: bhagavān parinirvṛtas tatra sthitasyaiva cāsya sthaviramahākāśyapo 'pi parinirvṛto
S01suvrnavu:11_1: [10] yāvad apareṇa samayena suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro veṇuvanaṅ gatas tatra bhikṣur anityatāpratisaṃyuktā gāthā svādhyāyati sma /
S01suvrnavu:12_0: āyur divā ca rātrau ca carato vā sthitasya vā /
S01suvrnavu:12_1: sroto mahānadīnām vā yāty eva na nivartate /1/
S01suvrnavu:12_3: alpodake ca matsyānāṃ kā nu teṣāṃ rati bhavet /2/
S01suvrnavu:12_6: na cirād vata kāyo 'yaṃ pṛthivīm adhiśeṣyate /
S01suvrnavu:12_7: śūnyo vyapeta vijñāno nirastaṃ vā kaḍaṅgaraṃ /4/
S01suvrnavu:12_11: mīmita paramāṃ śāntiṃ yogakṣemam anuttaram iti /6/
S01suvrnavu:13_1: [11] athaitā gāthāḥ śrutvā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ samvignaḥ saṃsārān nirvāṇānuśaṃsadarśī /
S01suvrnavu:13_3: ārya kim idam iti bhikṣuṇābhihitam āyuṣman buddhavacanam iti /
S01suvrnavu:13_4: tasya śrutvā bhagavacchāsane mahān prasāda utpannaḥ pravrajyābhilāṣo mokṣābhilāś ca /
S01suvrnavu:13_5: tatas tasya bhikṣoḥ satkṛtya pādayor nipatya kathayaty ārya pravrajitum icchāmi /
S01suvrnavu:13_7: bhikṣuṇābhihitam āyuṣman kim anujñāto 'si mātāpitṛbhyām iti /
S01suvrnavu:13_8: sa kathayati neti / bhikṣuḥ kathayati gacchāyuṣmān mātāpitarau tāvad avalokaya na hy ananujñātaṃ mātāpitṛbhyām vayaṃ pravrājayāma iti /
S01suvrnavu:14_1: [12] tataḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ saṃsārabhayodvignamanāḥ svaniveśanaṃ gatvā mātuḥ pādayor nipatya kathayaty ambānujānīhi māṃ pravrajāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye /
S01suvrnavu:14_4: putra tvam me ekaputrakaḥ priyo manāpaḥ kānto 'pratikūlo manorathaśataiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:14_5: kathan nāma tvaṃ mām apahāya pravrajasīti /
S01suvrnavu:14_6: sa kathayaty ambāvaśyaṃ bhāvī priyaviprayogas tad anujānīhi māṃ pravrajāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaya iti /
S01suvrnavu:14_7: tasya śrutvā mahān samvego jātaḥ sā bāṣpagadgadakaṇṭhī provāca /
S01suvrnavu:14_8: putra mā māṃ trir api vakṣyasi /
S01suvrnavu:14_9: mā me uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ mukhād āgamiṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:14_10: sā saṃlakṣayati / yādṛśo 'sya vyavasāyo na śakṣyam evaṃ mayā nivārayitum /
S01suvrnavu:14_11: upāyasamvidhānaṅ karomīti / tataḥ sā kathayati / putra tava pitā buddhaśāsane kārāṅ kariṣyātīti mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:14_12: sa yāvan nāgacchati / tāvat tvān nānujānāmi / yady asāv āgata tvām anujñāsyati pravrajiṣyasīti /
S01suvrnavu:14_14: yadi bhūyo 'py enāṃ vakṣyāmi kadācid eṣā mahāntaṃ samvegam āpasyate /
S01suvrnavu:14_15: tad yāvan me pitā nāgacchati tāvat tiṣṭhāmīti /
S01suvrnavu:14_16: sa tuṣṇīm avasthitaḥ / yadā ca suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro vīthīm avatarati /
S01suvrnavu:14_17: tadā lokas tasya rūpodāryasampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirīkṣamāṇo na_atra tṛptim upayāti /
S01suvrnavu:14_18: sa mahājanakāyasya vallabho jātas tasya rūpaudārya sampadā samākṛṣṭamanaso 'tyantaṃ kāmavimukhatāṃ dṛṣṭvā mātā saṃlakṣayati /
S01suvrnavu:14_19: dhik kaṣṭaṃ yādṛśo 'sya vyavasāyas tadāpy eṣa mām apahāya pravrajiṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:14_20: tato nityaṃ śaṅkitamanasā tasyānukūlaṃ pravartitum ārabdhā /
S01suvrnavu:15_1: [13] suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro 'bhīkṣṇam paṇḍitān śramaṇān brāhmaṇān sevate /
S01suvrnavu:15_2: sa tatra yat subhāṣitaṃ mokṣamātrānukūlaṃ śṛṇoti /
S01suvrnavu:15_3: tatpustake 'bhilikhati / divākarasya ca sārthavāhasya rājagṛhān nagarād bahir udyānaṃ puṣpaphalasalilasampannaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:15_4: tataḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāras tat paitṛkam udyānaṃ dine dine gatvā subhāṣitapustakaṃ vācayaṃs tiṣṭhati /
S01suvrnavu:15_5: tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare kāśisundarī nāma veśyā prativasati /
S01suvrnavu:15_6: strīrūpayauvanasampannā mahājanavallabhā rājñaś cājātaśatroḥ pracaṇḍanāmāmātyas tasya rājño 'tyartham bahumataḥ /
S01suvrnavu:15_7: sa kāśisundaryāṃ dārikāyām atyartaṃ saṃraktacittas tayā saha dine dine svam udyānaṅ gatvā ratikrīḍām anubhavati /
S01suvrnavu:16_1: [14] yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśisundarīdārikā sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā rājagṛhān nirgatya pracaṇḍasyāmātyasyodyānaṃ saṃprasthitā /
S01suvrnavu:16_2: suvarṇavarṇaś ca kumāro rājagṛhān nagarān nirgatya svam udyānaṅ gacchati /
S01suvrnavu:16_3: adrākṣīt kāśisundarī dārikā suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram atyantam abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetam uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataṃ /
S01suvrnavu:16_4: sarvajanamanonayanaharaṃ suvarṇavarṇapītair vastrair avaguṇṭhitavigrahaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar asyā etad abhavat /
S01suvrnavu:16_5: aho rūpaudāryasampadaḥ / aho varṇapuṣkalatā kṛtabhāgyā sā nārī yasyā eṣa bharttā bhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:16_7: mandabhāgyā sā nārī sā īdṛśena puruṣeṇa sārddhaṃ ratikrīḍān nānubhavati /
S01suvrnavu:16_8: vayaṃ rūpajīvinyaḥ / sādhāraṇapuruṣāṇām eṣa ca kumāraḥ pratyagrayauvanasamanvāgataḥ /
S01suvrnavu:16_9: yan nv aham enaṃ tathā pralobhayeyaṃ yathā mamānena saha saṃyogo bhaved iti /
S01suvrnavu:16_10: sā tasya purataḥ sthitvā nimittam upadarśayitum ārabdhā /
S01suvrnavu:16_11: sa mahātmā prakṛtyaiva kāmavimukhatvān nirvāṇapravaṇatvād vā ca na tāṃ samanvāharati /
S01suvrnavu:17_2: teneha māṃ na samanvāharaty eṣa codyānaṃ samprasthito 'ham api tatraiva gacchāmi /
S01suvrnavu:17_3: tatra cainaṃ pracchanne pralobhayiṣyāmīti sā tasya pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhā suvarṇavarṇena kumāreṇopalakṣitā tenāgrataḥ praviśya tasyodyānasya dvāraṃ baddhaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:17_5: kumāra katham evaṃ yujyate / ahaṃ tvām uddiśyāgatā / na yuktaṃ tava mayy evaṃ naiṣṭhuryam upadarśayitum iti /
S01suvrnavu:17_7: sā saṃlakṣayati / dvābhyām atra bhavitavyaṃ / atha vātyantaṃ kāmair anarthī /
S01suvrnavu:17_9: sarvathā na śakyam eṣa mayā rūpeṇa vā vacasā vā ārādhayituṃ sparśenainam ārādhayiṣyāmi /
S01suvrnavu:17_10: eṣa ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā dvāraṃ badhnāti /
S01suvrnavu:17_11: ka upāyaḥ syād yenāham enaṃ pracchannam āsādayeyaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:17_12_0: atha vāpratisaṃviditam evāsya śvaḥ prathamataram āgatya etam udyānaṃ praviśya sthāsyāmi
S01suvrnavu:17_12_1: parata enam āgatam āliṅganādibhiḥ gātrasaṃsparśanais tathārādhayiṣyāmi yathā me vaśago
S01suvrnavu:17_14: taṃ ca divasaṃ pracanṇḍasyāmātyasyodyānaṃ na gatā /
S01suvrnavu:18_1_0: [16] pracaṇḍo 'py amātyaḥ sve udyāne tām udīkṣamānaś ciraṃ parikhinnaḥ sūryasyāṣṭaṅgamanakālasamaye
S01suvrnavu:18_1_1: nagaraṃ praviṣṭas tena sve gṛhe kāśisundaryā dūto 'nupreṣitaḥ kim arthaṃ tvam adya
S01suvrnavu:18_2: kāśisundarī dārikā vyākṣepaṃ kṛtavatī āryaputrādya me śirorujātīva bādhate yenodyānaṃ nāgateti /
S01suvrnavu:18_4: na tasyāḥ śirorujā bādhate 'pi tv eṣā suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya sakāśam udyānaṃ gatā /
S01suvrnavu:18_8: yathā śvaḥ kāśisundarī dārikā na bhaviṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:18_10: pratikruṣṭaṃ caitad vairāṇāṃ yad uta strīvairam iti /
S01suvrnavu:18_11: sa krodhāgninā dahyamānahṛdayas tān niśāṃ kṛcchreṇātināmitavān /
S01suvrnavu:18_12: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām anyatamam āptapuruṣam āmantrayate /
S01suvrnavu:18_13_0: khaḍgam gṛhāṇa rājagṛhād bahir udyānaṃ gamiṣyāmi tatrāsti me kiñcid ātyayikaṃ prayojanam
S01suvrnavu:18_13_1: ity evaṃ svāminn iti sa puruṣaḥ khaḍgam ādāya tasya pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhas tataḥ pracaṇḍo
S01suvrnavu:18_13_2: 'mātyas tena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ rājagrān nirgatya divākarasya sārthavāhasyodyānaṃ praviśyāvasthitaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:19_1: [17] kāśisundary api dārikā vicitravastrālaṅkārālaṅkṛtaśarīrā rājagṛān nāgarān nirgatya divākarasya sārthavāhasyodyānaṅ gatā /
S01suvrnavu:19_2: sā tatra praviṣṭā yāvat paśyati pracaṇḍam amātyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃtrastā /
S01suvrnavu:19_3: saṃlakṣayaty eṣa prakṛtyaiva pracaṇḍo niyataṃ me 'dya mahāntam anarthaṅ karotīti pratinivarttitukāmābhūt /
S01suvrnavu:19_4_0: tataḥ pracaṇḍo 'mātyas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāgnijvalitamanās triśikhāṃ lalāṭe bhṛkurṭiṃ
S01suvrnavu:19_4_1: kṛtvā pradhāvitas tatas tāṃ sarabhasaṃ keśeṣu gṛhītvā nirdayam avāṅmukhīṃ pṛthivyāṃ
S01suvrnavu:19_4_2: pātayitvā samākṛṣṭavān evañ cāha tvam ihāgatya suvarṇavarṇena kumāreṇa sārddhaṃ paricārayasi /
S01suvrnavu:19_5: mama caivaṅ kathayasi / śirorujātīva me bādhate / yena tvatsakāśaṇ nāgateti / tad adya te tādṛśam maryādābandhāṃ karomi yena punar na bhavatī jīvalokaṃ drakṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:19_7: tac chrutvā kāśisundarī dārikā tadākarṣaṇaparākarṣaṇajaṃ duḥkham agaṇayitvā maraṇabhayabhītā bāṣpoparuddhyamānagadagadakaṇṭhī hā idānīn na bhaviṣyāmīti /
S01suvrnavu:19_8: kampamānagātrī pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya pādayor nipatya karuṇadīnavilamvitair akṣarair uvāca prasīdatv āryaputro nārhasi māṃ praghātayitum iti nityāparādho mātṛgrāmaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:19_9: itaḥ prabhṛti na bhūya evaṅ kariṣyāmi /
S01suvrnavu:19_11: tad alam anena sāhasena prayaccha jīvitam iti /
S01suvrnavu:19_12: tasya durātmana evaṃ karuṇadīnavilamvitair akṣarair ucyamānasya krodhāgnir vardhata eva /
S01suvrnavu:19_13: tatas taṃ sahāyakam uvāca śīghram asyā anena khaḍgenotkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyān nipātayety /
S01suvrnavu:20_1: [18] atha sa puruṣas tasya durātmano 'nyāyavaco duraktam upaśrutya kampitum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:20_2: cintayati ca / aho nairghṛṇyam eṣā hi strī bahuprakāram asyopayuktā /
S01suvrnavu:20_3: tat kathan nāma svalpasyāparādhasyārthe praghātayitum icchati /
S01suvrnavu:20_4: aho vayam api jīvikābhayabhītā yena nāmāsyāśīviṣaprakhyasya puruṣādhamasya pārṣve tiṣṭhāmaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:20_6: kim atra prāptakālaṃ atha vā sphuṭam enaṃ vakṣyāmi kadācid eva sphuṭam ucyamānaḥ pratinivartetāsmāt pāpakād asaddharmād iti /
S01suvrnavu:20_7: viditvā samvignamanās tasyāś ca striyās tair atikaruṇair vilāpair dravīkṛtasantāno bāṣpāmbupariplutaq_īkṣaṇaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ pracaṇḍam amātyam uvāca /
S01suvrnavu:20_8_0: prasīdatu svāmī nārhasi mām evaṃvidhe 'kārye niyojayitun nāhaṃ niṣādo nāpi vadhyaghātakaḥ
S01suvrnavu:20_8_1: kathaṃ hi nāma yat karmma vadhyaghātakānām api notsahate manas tatkarmaṇi pratārayati
S01suvrnavu:20_9: eṣā ca strī prakāśātyartham abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvakalābhijñā rājagṛhanivāsino nānādigdeśābhyāgatasya ca vidagdhajanasyātīva vallabhā /
S01suvrnavu:20_11: kathaṃ hi nāma svāmin prajñātamanuṣyasya vicakṣaṇasyāsminn anunayasthāne dveṣa utpannas tad alam īdṛśena lokadvayavirudhāvāhakena vyavasāyena /
S01suvrnavu:20_12: prasīda nārhasi mām ātmanañ cānena duścaritāgninā dagdhum /
S01suvrnavu:21_1: prītim etām manuṣyāṇāṃ manye mārtimatīm iva /1/
S01suvrnavu:21_2: karuṇaiḥ karuṇair dīnair madhurair akṣarair iyaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:21_3: vijñapayati svāmiṃs te dṛṇāti mama mānasaṃ /2/
S01suvrnavu:21_4: kampate hṛdayam me 'dya śrutvā dīptaṃ vacas tava /
S01suvrnavu:21_5: ko 'sau nirghṛṇacittaḥ syād ya imāṃ hantum edhate /3/
S01suvrnavu:21_6: mlecchā api naināṃ hantum utsahante sunirghṛṇāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:21_7: kathan nu mama tāṃ hantuṃ svāmin utsahate manaḥ /4/
S01suvrnavu:21_8: paśūnām api yāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavaty anunayo mahān /
S01suvrnavu:21_9: tasyāḥ ko manuṣyo bhūtvā śastreṇa prahariṣyati /5/
S01suvrnavu:21_10: tat prasīda tavāyuktam api śrotum idam vacaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:21_11: prāg eva acarituṃ svāmin karmmedam atidāruṇam iti /6/
S01suvrnavu:21_13: [19] atha sa durātmā vipannāśayatvād evam api hṛdayagrāhakair vacobhis tena puruṣeṇābhidhiyamāno naiva svacittaṃ pratilabhate /
S01suvrnavu:21_14: / saroṣabhrūlatābhaṅgaraudreṇa ca mukhena taṃ puruṣam uvāca /
S01suvrnavu:21_15_0: / bhoḥ puruṣa kas tavāsyāṃ upary anunayo yan nāma madīyām ājñāṃ vilaṅghya necchasy
S01suvrnavu:21_15_1: enāṃ praghātayituṃ sarvathā yadi tvam enāṃ praghātayiṣyasīty evaṃ kuśalan no cen
S01suvrnavu:21_15_2: na praghātayiṣyasi tavādya jīvitaṃ ca bhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:21_16: tato 'sau puruṣas tasya tat karkaśaṃ vyavasāyaṃ buddhvā bhītaś cintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:21_18: sa ced asyājñāṃ na kariṣyāmi niyatam adya māṃ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:21_19: yo hi nāmaivaṃvidhiṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ bahuprakāram upayuktaṃ praghātayitum udyataḥ sa māṃ na praghātayiṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:21_20: kuta etat kathañ ca nāma manuṣyo 'ham ity ātmānam manye /
S01suvrnavu:21_21: īdṛśyā janapadakalyāṇinyāḥ striyāḥ śarīre śastraṃ nipātayiṣyāmi /
S01suvrnavu:21_22_0: sarvathā kāmaṃ svajīvitavināśo na tv evāsyāḥ prahāraṃ dāsyāmīti niścayaṃ kṛtavāṃs
S01suvrnavu:21_22_1: tasya buddhir utpannā yady ahaṃ khaḍgam ādāya niṣpalāyeyaṃ evaṃ mayā tv ātmā parirakṣito
S01suvrnavu:21_23: kāśisundarī dāriketi / sa khaḍgam ādāya tasmād udyānād niṣkramya sarvajavena niḥpalānaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:21_24: pracaṇḍo py amātyas tasya pṛṣṭhato dvārakoṣṭhaṃ yāvad anubaddhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:22_1: [20] tataḥ kāśisundarī dārikā gatapratyāgataprāṇam ivātmānam manyamano tvaritatvaritam utthāya niḥpalāyāmīti prākārasamīpam abhigatā /
S01suvrnavu:22_2: sā coccaḥ prākāraṃ na śaknoti vilaṅghayituṃ /
S01suvrnavu:22_3: pracaṇḍaś cāmātyaḥ pratinivṛtya yāvat tasmin pradeśe kāśisundarīṃ dārikān na paśyati /
S01suvrnavu:22_4: itaś cāmutaś ca vyavalokayitum ārabdho yāvat paśyati prākārasamīpam abhigatāṃ sa tvaritatvaritaṃ tasyāḥ samīpaṃ gantum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:22_6: tena sā dakṣiṇe caraṇe daṣṭā sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣpalānaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:22_8: eṣaḥ ca pracaṇḍo mām āgatya praghātayiṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:22_12: tatas tena durātmanā nirghṛṇahṛdayena tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasā kāśisundarīṃ dārikāṃ tasmād atimuktakalatāgahanād ākṛṣya tasyāḥ śirasi pārṣṇiprahāro dattaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:22_13_0: sukumārā sā strī tena prahāreṇa viṣavegena ca mūrcchitā pracaṇḍo 'py amātyas tān
S01suvrnavu:22_13_1: nirīkṣitum ārabdho yāvat paśyati niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ tasyaitad abhavan mṛteyam
S01suvrnavu:22_14: tataś ca māṃ mā kaścid drakṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:23_1: [21] suvarṇavarṇaś ca kumāro rājagṛhān niṣkramya svam udyānam anuprāptaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:23_2: yāvat paśyati kāśisundarīṃ dārikām itaś cāmutaś ca samāhṛṣṭāṃ muktakeśīṃ niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ dṛṣṭvā cāsya mahāsamvega utpannaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:23_3: tenopalakṣitaṃ kenāpy eṣā durātmanā nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena vairānubaddhenāhānīya praghātitā bhaviṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:23_4: dhik kaṣṭam īdṛśā api nāma sattvā bhavanti /
S01suvrnavu:23_6: tena tad udyānaṃ sarvaṃ pratyavekṣitaṃ yāvan na kiñcit paśyati tasyaiva tad abhavad eṣā strī prajñātā 'sminn udyāne praghātitā /
S01suvrnavu:23_7: atra na kiñcit paśyāmi / sarvathā durātmanā kenāpi svadaurātmyam antargataṃ prakaṭīkurvatā mana mastake 'yaśo 'śanir nipātita iti /
S01suvrnavu:23_8: sa caivaṃ samvignamanāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyasthitaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:24_2: praviśya ca tad udyānaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:24_3: yāvat paśyanti kāśisundarīṃ dārikām itaś cāmutaś ca samāhṛṣṭāṃ muktakeśīṃ niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ /
S01suvrnavu:24_4: dṛṣṭvā suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya pūrvakarmavipākasāmarthyān na tāṃ kaścit paricchinatti /
S01suvrnavu:24_5: yatheyaṃ mūrcchiteti / kintarhi kālagateti / tatas te rājapuruṣāḥ parasparam ūcuḥ /
S01suvrnavu:24_8: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ muktvā na kañcid anyaṃ paśyanti /
S01suvrnavu:24_11: sa kathayati bhavanto 'ham api na jāne mayāpy eṣā eva dṛṣṭeti /
S01suvrnavu:25_1: [23] atha te rājapuruṣāḥ parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:25_2: bhavanta eṣa kumāro 'tyantavinīto nāsyedaṃ karma saṃbhāvyate /
S01suvrnavu:25_3: atra ca na kañcid anyaṃ paśyāmaḥ sarvathā paramasaṅkaṭam anupraviṣṭāḥ smaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:25_5: tatraikaḥ kathayati / bhavanto na vayaṃ paricchettuṃ samarthā /
S01suvrnavu:25_6: etāṃ striyaṃ kumārañ ca karaṇamaṇḍapaṃ nayāmas tatrāmātyā eva paricchetsyantīti /
S01suvrnavu:25_7_0: tatas te rājapuruṣās tāṃ striyaṃ śivikām āropya suvarṇavarṇañ ca kumāram ādāya karaṇamaṇḍapaṅ
S01suvrnavu:25_7_1: gatās tatra ca karaṇamaṇḍape pracaṇḍo 'mātyaḥ pratipattyaivānukūlair vyavahāribhiḥ
S01suvrnavu:25_8: sannipatito yadbhūyasā tān eva rājapuruṣān āgamayamānas tena te dūrata eva dṛṣṭāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:25_9: pṛṣṭāś ca bhavantaḥ kim idam iti /
S01suvrnavu:25_10: tair ākhyātam eṣāsmābhiḥ strī divārakasya sārthavāhasyodyāne kālagatā dṛṣṭā tañ codyānam asmābhiḥ pratyavekṣitatam /
S01suvrnavu:25_11: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ muktvā na kañcid anyaṃ paśyāmaḥ eṣa cāsmābhiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kumāraḥ /
S01suvrnavu:25_13: anenākhyātam aham api bhavanto na jāne mayāpy eṣā evam eva dṛṣṭeti /
S01suvrnavu:25_14: tad idānīṃ svāmina evaṃ pravicārayantv iti /
S01suvrnavu:26_2: bhavanto mūhūrtaṃ tāvad avīkṣadhvaṃ yāvad ahaṃ rājño nivedayāmīti /
S01suvrnavu:26_3: tena rājño 'jātaśatror gṛhaṃ gatvā daurvārikaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭo bhoḥ puruṣadevaḥ kiṃ karotīti /
S01suvrnavu:26_4: tenākhyātam upariprāsādatalagato niḥpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
S01suvrnavu:26_5: labdhapraṇayo 'sau tena pratihārī preṣitā gaccha devasya nivedayāmātyā vijñapayanti /
S01suvrnavu:26_6: divākarasya sārthavāhasya putreṇodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitā /
S01suvrnavu:26_7: sa ca na_ubhyupagacchati / katham atrāsmābhiḥ pratipattavyam iti /
S01suvrnavu:26_8: tayā gatvā rājño niveditaṃ rājā tatra ratikrīḍāyām atīva śaktaḥ kathayati /
S01suvrnavu:26_9: gacchāmātyān evam vada yūyam evaṃ nipuṇaṃ pravicārayadhvam iti /
S01suvrnavu:26_10: tayā nirgatya pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya niveditam evaṃ devaḥ samājñāpayatīti /
S01suvrnavu:27_1: [25] tataḥ pracaṇḍo 'mātyaḥ karaṇamaṇḍapam āgatya tān rājapuruṣān uvāca /
S01suvrnavu:27_4: bhavanto 'nena kumāreṇeyaṅ kāśisundarī dārikā udyāne praghātitā /
S01suvrnavu:27_5_0: gacchatainaṃ durācāraṃ paścād bāhubandhanaṃ gāḍhaṃ kṛtvā kharasvareṇa paṭena vādyamānena
S01suvrnavu:27_5_1: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu śravaṇamukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa nirṇamayya
S01suvrnavu:27_5_2: mahāśmaśān nītvā śūle samāropayata mṛtañ cainaṃ kāśisundaryā dārikayā sahaikāñ citām
S01suvrnavu:27_6: atha te vadhyaghātakāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram atyartham abhirūpam uttaptasuvarṇaparvvataśṛṅgam iva paramayā śriyā jvalantam udvīkṣya samvignāḥ parasparam ūcuḥ /
S01suvrnavu:27_7: bhavantaḥ kiñcāpi vayam vadhyaghātakās tat katham īdṛśamatidurllabhadarśanaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ praghātayiṣyāmaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:27_8: sarvathā kāmam asmākaṃ svajīvitavināśo na tv evainaṃ praghātayiṣyāmaḥ iti /
S01suvrnavu:28_1: [26] pracaṇḍo 'mātyas tān parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurvāṇāṅ dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati /
S01suvrnavu:28_2: bhavantaḥ kiṃ sthīyate / śīghramenaṃ nayatheti / te kṛtāñjalayo vijñapayitum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:28_3: prasīda svāmin / kiñcāpi vayam vadhyaghātakā api notsahāmahe īdṛśaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ mahājanavallabhaṃ praghātayitum iti /
S01suvrnavu:28_5: bhavanto yadi yūyam enaṃ na praghātayiṣyatha /
S01suvrnavu:28_6: yuṣmākam evādya saputrakalatrabāndhavānāṃ jīvitāni na bhaviṣyantīti /
S01suvrnavu:28_9: yo hi nāma suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram evam atidurlabhadarśanaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ parityaktum udyataḥ yo 'smān saputrakalatrabandhavān praghātayiṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:28_10: kuta etat / tad atisaṅkaṭam anupraviṣṭāḥ smaḥ /

S01suvrnavu:34_2: tato jalābhiṣekapratyāgataprāṇā utthāya hā putra hā putreti vikrośantī keśā luñcamānā uras tāḍayantī kampamānā muhur muhur moham upagacchantī gṛhān nirgatya vīthīm avatīrṇā /
S01suvrnavu:34_3: sā putraviyogaśokābhyāhatā viklavahṛdayā tattad vilapantī ekaikaṃ pṛcchati /
S01suvrnavu:34_4: katareṇa pathā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīto bhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:34_5: hā putrakaṃ na paśyāmi paritrāyadhvaṃ paritrāyadhvaṃ putrakam me darśayateti /

S01suvrnavu:35_2: tathā tathā tīvrataraśokaduḥkhābhyāhatā uccair vikrośantī ekaikasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭī vijñāpayati /
S01suvrnavu:35_3: paritrāyadhvaṃ paritrāyadhvam me śīghram avakāśam anuprayacchata yāvat kumāro nātikramyate anena pathā /

S01suvrnavu:35_5: sā ca tatrāvakāśam alabhamānā hā kathaṃ bhoḥ putra na labha iti /
S01suvrnavu:35_7: tato jaloddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvarttanaparivartanaṅ kartum ārabdhā /

S01suvrnavu:36_1: [33] punar api ca kṛtakarapuṭā paurān vijñapayantī / viklavahṛdayā provāca /

S01suvrnavu:37_4: avinīto virūpo vā na ca me hṛdayapriyaḥ /

S01suvrnavu:37_6: anukampā sa ced asti pakṣapāto guṇeṣu vā /

S01suvrnavu:37_15: dahyate hṛdayañ cāpi moham eti ca mānasaṃ /8/

S01suvrnavu:37_18: nūnaṃ kṛtan mayā pāpam anyajanmani dāruṇaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:37_20: yena satyena cittam me śatruṣv api na pāpakaṃ /

S01suvrnavu:38_1: [34] divākaraś ca sārthavāhaḥ samudrāt saṃsiddhayānpātro rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ /

S01suvrnavu:38_7: tathā hy etāni nimittāni tadviyogaṃ sūcayantīty āha ca /
S01suvrnavu:39_0: yathā sphurati netram me yathā rauti vihaṅgamaḥ /

S01suvrnavu:46_1_1: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvayantaḥ paribhrāmayanto 'ho vata kumārasya kecit
S01suvrnavu:46_1_2: mocayitāro bhaviṣyanty apy evaṃ vayam īdṛśam akāryaṃ na kurma iti /
S01suvrnavu:46_2: te rājapuruṣā nikṛṣṭakhaḍgapāṇayas samprāptā tais teṣām vadhyaghātakānāṃ yathā sandiṣṭam ākhyātaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:46_3: uktāś ca yady enaṃ śīghraṃ nagarān niṣkrāmya yathā sandiṣṭena vidhinā na praghātayata /
S01suvrnavu:46_4: vayaṃ yuṣmān sāmpratam eva praghātayāma iti /
S01suvrnavu:46_5: te tān atisekanikṛṣṭān khaḍgavyagraṣṭān yamapuruṣān ivālokya saṃtrastās tato maraṇabhayabhītāś cintayituṃ pravṛttāḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ na kenacit kumārasya paritrāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:46_7: bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇais tai rājapuruṣair adhiṣṭhitāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ nagarān niṣkrāmayitum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:47_1: [41] tañ ca nagarān niṣkāsyamānam ālokyānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi ekaraveṇoccair vikroṣṭum ārabdhāni hā kaṣṭam eṣa /
S01suvrnavu:47_10: amī divākarasya sārthavāhasya mūrtimantaḥ prāṇā apahriyante /
S01suvrnavu:47_11: hā kaṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma kumāro 'ṭavyām evaṃ paribhrāmya niṣkāsito na kenacid asya paritrāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:47_12: eṣa sāmprataṃ rājagṛhān nagarāc candramā mṛtyurāhuṇā grasyate /
S01suvrnavu:47_14: etad rājagṛhanagaranivāsināṃ paurāṇāṃ netrāmṛtam adarśanapathe vyavasthāpyate /
S01suvrnavu:47_18: eṣa rājagṛhanagaranivāsināṃ paurāṇāṃ hṛdayavallabho vināśāya nīyate /
S01suvrnavu:47_19: kam idānīṃ rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurā animiṣam avalokayiṣyanti /
S01suvrnavu:47_20: kam idānīṃ dṛṣṭvā prītimanaso bhaviṣyantīti nirāśībhūtāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:48_2: niḥkāsitaḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro rājagṛhān nagarād iti /
S01suvrnavu:48_4: tatas te paurikā vyavahāriṇas tac chrutvā nirāśībhūtās tair āgatya teṣāṃ paurāṇām etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇāveditaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:48_7: bhavanto 'pi kalirājena tādṛśaḥ pitā dhārmiko dharmarājā jīvitād vyavaropitaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:48_8: idānīm ārabdha evaṃvidhān api prakhyātaguṇān mahājanavallabhān puruṣaviśeṣān asaṃdṛśyān praghātayituṃ /
S01suvrnavu:48_10: aho 'viśeṣajñatā mantriṇāṃ yo nāmaivam atyantarūpaudāryasampannatvāc ca vinītatvāc ca pūjām arhati sa eva guṇavān puruṣaviśeṣaḥ katham avicārya badhāya parityajyate /
S01suvrnavu:48_11: athavā kāla evāyam īdṛśaḥ samupasthito yad asanto vivarddhante /
S01suvrnavu:48_13: kālopakarṣya daurātmyam udbhāvayanto divākarasya sārthavāhasya etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇākhyātavantaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:49_1: [43] tac chrutvā vihatāśo divākaraḥ sārthavāhas tīvra śokaduḥkhābhyāhato mūrcchito bhūmau patitaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:49_2: tato jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇo viṣaṇṇamanā nirānandaḥ sāṃprataṃ putrako me praghātyata iti /
S01suvrnavu:50_0: locanānanda hā putra hā me kulavibhūṣaṇa /
S01suvrnavu:50_2: vimuhyate me hṛdayaṃ bhramanti ca diśo 'dhunā /
S01suvrnavu:50_5: hā kathaṃ dāruṇaṃ tāta tava vyasanam āgataṃ /3/
S01suvrnavu:50_9: yair evaṃ vinayopetas tvaṃ putra na vicāritaḥ /5/
S01suvrnavu:50_12: viśeṣo dhik sādhujano nūnam astaṅgato hṛdi /
S01suvrnavu:50_13: guṇavān api yat putra nirākrandaḥ praghātyase /7/
S01suvrnavu:50_14: tat kiṃ viproṣitāḥ sarvā nagarasyāsya devatāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:50_15: ghātyamānam upekṣante yad evaṃ guṇinaṃ janaṃ /8/
S01suvrnavu:50_16: sendrāḥ salokapālāś ca devā ye ca maharddhikāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:50_17: anukampām upādāya te me rakṣantu putrakaṃ /9/
S01suvrnavu:50_19: te 'nukampāṃ puraskṛtya parirakṣantu me sutam iti /10/
S01suvrnavu:51_1: [44] tasya buddhir utpannā kim artham ahaṃ viṣīdāmi yan nv ahaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakalajagad ekabāndhavaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ samunasmareyaṃ sa hi bhagavān anāthānān nāthaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:51_2: atrāṇānāṃ trāṇaṃ / aśaraṇānāṃ śaraṇaṃ / aparāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaṃ / tathā hi tena bhagavatā kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasambādhaprāptā bahavaḥ sattvās tebhyas tebhyo mahābhayebhyaḥ parimocitā /
S01suvrnavu:51_3: tathā mahāsamudram adhyagatā vaṇijo makarasya bhayasantrastāḥ samanusmaraṇamātreṇaiva tasmān maraṇabhayāt paritrātāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:51_4: tathā naika puruṣaghātakenaikarabhasenodyataśastreṇāṅgulīmālena ghātyamānā tajjananī tasmāj jīvitopacchedabhayāt paritrātā /
S01suvrnavu:51_5_2: yakṣasyāhārārtham upanāmitas tadvadvanasamīpastho hastaka āṭavakas tasmān maraṇabhayāt
S01suvrnavu:51_6: / samarthaḥ sa bhagavān me putram asmāt saṅkaṭāt parimocayituṃ /
S01suvrnavu:51_7: yan nv ahaṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ mahākaruṇikaṃ parmavatsalasvabhāvaṃ samanusmareyam iti /
S01suvrnavu:51_8: samīpastham anyatam upāsakaṃ pṛṣṭavān idānīṃ bhagavān kutra viharatīti /
S01suvrnavu:51_9: tato 'sav upāsako bhagavantam anusmṛtya bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭham uvāca /
S01suvrnavu:51_10: yaḥ sārthavāho lokasya yo loke sukhadāyakaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:51_13: nirvṛtaḥ sa jino loke dīpaḥ snehakṣayād iti /2/
S01suvrnavu:52_1: [45] tac chrutvā divākaraḥ sārthavāho bhagavadviyogād dviguṇīkṛtaśokaśalyābhyāhato mūrcchito bhūmau nipapāta /
S01suvrnavu:52_2: tato jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇa utthāya yasyāṃ diśi bhagavān parinirvṛtas tadabhimukho uccair vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:52_10: anāthaḥ khalv ayaṃ lokaḥ kaṃ nāthaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati /4/
S01suvrnavu:52_11: ye ca te dharmato jātā vineyajanaputrakāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:52_12: tvayā vihīnās te sarve kariṣyanti kam āśrayaṃ /5/
S01suvrnavu:52_14: vihatāśaṃ janaṃ kṛtvā kām āśāṃ tvaṃ gato mune /6/
S01suvrnavu:52_16: ko nu vakṣyati saddharmam adhunā nirvṛte tvayi /7/
S01suvrnavu:52_17: hā hato 'yam anya loko lokaḥ sāmarakinnaraḥ /
S01suvrnavu:52_22: ye guṇāḥ samavāpyante kas tan bhūyo na 'bhidhāsyati /10/
S01suvrnavu:52_32: kathaṃ na viduṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛdayan na vidīryate /15/
S01suvrnavu:52_36: yayā tvayy api nāmādya pakṣapāto na darśitaḥ /17/
S01suvrnavu:52_41: nirvṛte tvayi ko me 'dya putraratnam anāgasaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:52_43: trātari tvayy anāthānāṃ gate tu paramāṅ gatim /
S01suvrnavu:52_44: hā jātaḥ sāṃpratam ahaṃ nirāśaḥ sutajīvite /21/
S01suvrnavu:52_45: adya me tat suvihitaṃ yat tvayoktaṃ mahātmane /
S01suvrnavu:52_46: sarvaiḥ priyair vinābhāvo bhavatīty uttamaṃ vaca iti /22/
S01suvrnavu:53_1: [46] sa evam bahuvidha paridevya tam upāsakam uvāca /
S01suvrnavu:53_2: bhoḥ kaścin mahāśrāvako 'pi tāvat tasya bhagavato 'vaśiṣyate /
S01suvrnavu:53_3: kasya bhagavān śāsanam anuparīkṣya parinirvṛta iti /
S01suvrnavu:53_4: tatas tenopāsakenoktaṃ sārthavāha śrūyate bhagavān sthaviramahākāśyapasya śāsanam anuparīkṣya parinirvṛtaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:53_5: sthaviramahākāśyapo 'pi bhagavadājñayaiva sthavirānandasya śāsanam anuparīndya parinirvṛtaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:53_7: sa idānīṃ tathāgata iva kāruṇyāt tāṃs tān grāmanagaranigamapallīpattanādīn gatvā vineyaṃ janānugrahaṃ karoti /
S01suvrnavu:53_11: tathā kleśavyādhigrastānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanābhaiṣajyapradānena vicikitsaṃ karoti suvaidyavat /
S01suvrnavu:53_12: kleśāndhakārāvaṣṭabdhānāṃ sattvānāṃ saddharmdeśanāraśminikareṇa kleśāndhakāraṃ vidhamayati sūryavat /
S01suvrnavu:53_20: adāntān sattvān damayaty amuktān mocayaty anāśvastān āśvasayaty aparinirvṛtān parinirvāpayati /
S01suvrnavu:53_23: tam eva samanusmara / samarthaḥ sa te 'dya sutam asmāt saṅkaṭāt parimocayatum iti /
S01suvrnavu:54_1: [47] tac chrutvā divākaraḥ sārthavāho gatapratyāgataprāṇa iva sasaṃbhramas tam upāsakam uvāca /
S01suvrnavu:54_3: tenoktaṃ sārthavāha śrutaṃ mayā sthavirānanda etarhi vaiśālyām viharaty āmrapālīvana iti /
S01suvrnavu:54_4_0: atha divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ sahasaivotthāya jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena
S01suvrnavu:55_2: nirvṛto bhagavān buddhaḥ śiṣyāś cāsya maharddhikāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:55_3: avaśiṣṭas tvam eko hi teṣāṃ śāsanavardhanaḥ /2/
S01suvrnavu:55_6: tad adyaivaṃvidhe nāthe tiṣṭhaty ārakṣake tvayi /
S01suvrnavu:55_8: na bhaved yadi sattvārtho na tiṣṭheyur bhavadvidhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:55_9: ghātyamānaṃ janaṃ śrāddham evaṃ katham upekṣase /5/
S01suvrnavu:55_10: sattvārthañ cec charīraṃ hi tvaṃ dhārayasi suvrata /
S01suvrnavu:55_11: tat kṛpāṃ sammukhīkṛtya samanvāhara me sutaṃ /6/
S01suvrnavu:55_14: kam vā vijñapayāmy anyaṃ ko 'nyo 'py evaṃ jagaddhite /
S01suvrnavu:55_15: nirdiṣṭaḥ śākyamuninā yathā tvam adhunā prabho /8/
S01suvrnavu:55_16: tvadṛte putrakasyānyas trātā nāsti vibho yataḥ /
S01suvrnavu:55_17: tasmāt tvaritam āgamya putram me trātum arhasi /9/
S01suvrnavu:56_1: [48] athaitasminn antare sthavirānandaḥ karuṇayāpūryyamāṇaś cintayaṃs trirātrestridivasasya śrāvakacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati /
S01suvrnavu:56_2: ko hīyate ko varddhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṅkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ sambādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:56_4: kam aham apāyamārgād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:56_6_0: kam āryadhanavirahitaṃ āryadhanaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpayeyam ity adrākṣīt sthavirānandaḥ
S01suvrnavu:56_6_2: kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasambādhaprāptaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā punas tatrastha eva ṛddhyā gajabhujasadṛśam
S01suvrnavu:56_6_3: bāhum abhiprasārya sahasaiva rājānam ajātaśatrum upariprāsādatalagatam atipramattavihāriṇam
S01suvrnavu:56_7: mahārāja na śobhanaṃ te kṛtaṃ yata suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ svayam eva na vicāritas tathādyaiṣa na sāṃpratam atrāpy anapakārī rājagṛhān niṣkāśya mahāśmaśānaṃ nīyate praghātayituṃ /
S01suvrnavu:56_8_0: nivārayety athaitat sthavirānandavacanam upaśrutya rājā sasambhramaṃ tvaritam abhinamya
S01suvrnavu:56_8_1: sthaviranandam uparidhavalagṛhastha utthāya mahatā svareṇa caturdiśam uktaṃ bhoḥ
S01suvrnavu:56_8_2: śrūyatāṃ yo mahāśmāśānaṃ tvarita mabhigamyāsmadvacanāt suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ ghātyamānaṃ
S01suvrnavu:56_8_3: pratimocayati tasyāhaṃ suvarṇapeṭakamanu prayacchāmi pañca ca grāmavarāṇi /
S01suvrnavu:56_10: tad rājño vacanam upaśrutya prāṇisahasrāṇi pradhāvitāni /
S01suvrnavu:57_1: [49] athaitasminn antare vadhyaghātakās tai rājapuruṣair adhiṣṭhitāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram ādāya mahāśmaśānam anuprāptāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:57_2_0: kāśisundarī dārikā svakair jñātibhir nīlapītalokahitāvadātair vastraiḥ samalaṅkṛtāyāṃ
S01suvrnavu:57_2_1: śivikāyām āropya mahāśmaśānam abhinirhṛtā tasyā jñātayas tām ekasmin pradeśe sthāpayitvā
S01suvrnavu:57_4: etāvad eṣā yuṣmābhiś citāyām āropayitavyā muhūrtaṃ tāvad udīkṣadhvaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:57_5_0: yāvad vayaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ śūle protaṃ kṛtvā praghātayāmo yat kāraṇam eṣa
S01suvrnavu:57_5_1: suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro 'nayā kāśisundaryā dārikayā saha ekāṃ citām āropya dhyāpayitavya
S01suvrnavu:57_5_2: ity uktvā śūlaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:58_1: [50] atha suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ śūlaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya mānam ālokya mātaram anusmṛtya tīvramanyudravīkṛtasantāno 'śrūṇi prapātayitum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:58_2: sāṃprataṃ mātur madviyogaṃ śrutvā kā 'vasthā bhaviṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:58_3: yā hi nāma pūrvaṃ yāmārddhamātram api mām apaśyantī parāpīḍāpraveditavatī sā mayādyaikaputreṇa viyuktā kathaṃ prāṇān dhārayiṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:58_4: hā kaṣṭam īdṛśo 'py aham evam adhanyo yan mām āgamya mātā madviyogaduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:58_5: tatas tair vadhyaghātakaiḥ tat śūlaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikhātaṃ paraparāṅ ca saṅjalpaṅ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:58_7: tatra caikaiko 'pi vyājaṃ kartum ārabdho yūyam āropayata /
S01suvrnavu:58_9: mama pṛṣṭhaśūlam mama pārśvaśūlam iti na teṣāṃ kaścid utsahate sma tad akāryaṅ kartuṃ /
S01suvrnavu:59_1: [51] tataḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāras teṣāṃ sañjarupaṃ śrutvā śūlañ ca pṛthivyāṃ nikhātam udvīkṣya hā sāmpratam ahaṃ na bhaviṣyāmīti /
S01suvrnavu:59_2: saṃsāra doṣodvigno mokṣamārggābhilāṣī nirānandamātmānamavagamya param abhayaviṣāda vihvalekṣaṇo vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:59_3: hā kaṣṭam idānīṃ mayā sudurllabhaṃ saddharmamahotsavaṃ manuṣyatvam āsādyākṛtārthe naiva marttavyam bhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:59_5: punar api mayā saṃsāracārake vastavyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:59_12: punar api mayā satataṃ kṣuttṛṣṇādimahadduḥkhadaurmanasyaparīteṣu nirnaṣṭapānabhojanaśabdeṣu mūtrapurīṣakheṭasiṃhāṇakādyāhāreṣu galagaṇḍakādiṣu preteṣūpapattavyam bhaviṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:60_1: [52] śrūyate ca kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā loka utpadyante /
S01suvrnavu:60_2: tad yathodumbare puṣpaṃ kadācit karhicit tathāgatapraveditasya dharmavinayasya lokeṣu darśanārthaṃ prajñāyate /
S01suvrnavu:60_3_0: durllabhā kṣaṇasampad durllabham manuṣyatvam āryāyatane pratyājātir indrayair vikalatā
S01suvrnavu:60_5: tad idam aṣṭākṣaṇavinirmuktam me manuṣyatvaṃ viphalī bhaviṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:60_6_0: tata kim idānīṅ karomi / kiṃ bhagavān mahākāruṇiko buddhas tiṣṭhati yaṃ samanusmārāmi
S01suvrnavu:60_6_1: yo mām āsyām avasthāyām anātham atrāṇam aśaraṇaṃ aparāyaṇaṃ nirālokaṃ kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasambādhaprāptaṃ
S01suvrnavu:60_7: sa ca bhagavān mama bhāgyāparādhena laghu laghu eva parinirvṛtaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:60_8: tat kim idānīm asyām avasthāyāṃ samanusmarāmi /
S01suvrnavu:60_9: ko me tathāgata iva kāruṇyād āgatya paritrāṇaṅ kariṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:61_1: [53] tasya buddhir utpannā sthavirānando mahātmā tiṣṭhati /
S01suvrnavu:61_2: taṃ samanusmarāmi / so 'pi mahātmā śrūyate sarvasattvahitāvahitacittasantānaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:61_3: tasya bhagavatā sthavirmahākāśyapena ca sakalaṃ śāsanam anuparīnditaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:61_4_0: tenādhunāvalokyāvalokya sarvasattvahitaṃ karaṇīyaṃ mahārddhikaś cāsau mahānubhāvaḥ
S01suvrnavu:61_4_1: samarthaś ca sthavirānando mām asmād vyasanāt paritrātuṃ tam eva samanusmarāmīti
S01suvrnavu:61_5: saṃsārabhayodvignaḥ / paramasamvegaprāptas tīvreṇāśayena sthavirānandam āyācituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:62_1: sthavirānanda vijñaptiṃ tvam idānīṃ śrotum arhasi /1/
S01suvrnavu:62_3: ayi nirvṛtim āyātaḥ kāśyape tu mahātmani /2/
S01suvrnavu:62_5: tvayy eva bhāraṃ nikṣipya jagato 'sya vibhūtaye /3/
S01suvrnavu:62_11: agrayas tvaṃ buddhaśiṣyāṇāṃ tvañ ca śāsanadhūrddharaḥ /6/
S01suvrnavu:62_12: tvam adya duḥkhapātālād yadi māṃ noddhariṣyasi /
S01suvrnavu:62_13: hato 'smi yasmād dheto 'nyaṃ nāthaṃ nānavaimi sāṃprataṃ /7/
